artist: Artist: Kitagawa Utamaro; Publisher: Matsumura Tatsuemon
dimension:
14 5/16 × 9 3/4 in. (36.3 × 24.7 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban)
23 × 19 × 1 1/2 in. (58.42 × 48.26 × 3.81 cm) (outer frame)
inscription:
Once the seeds of love
are sown 
in the flooded paddy, 
let our union
watertight
(Koi no tane 
Maki some shi yori
Naeshiro no
Mizu mo mora sa nu
Naka to koso nare)
by Kino Masanari
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: "Love for a Farmer's Wife"
